sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprites.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chest, Enemy, Obstacle, Turtle

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a default sprite.
    Version:
    5/6/22

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(double x, double y, int facingDir)
      This creates a sprite at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(double x,
              double y,
              int facingDir)
        This creates a sprite at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the sprite
        y - the y-coordinate of the sprite
        facingDir - the initial direction the sprite faces when spawned
